channel.title: SoftLayer_Billing_Item_Software_Component_OperatingSystem_Addon on SoftLayer API
channel.description: Recent content in SoftLayer_Billing_Item_Software_Component_OperatingSystem_Addon on SoftLayer API

item.title: SoftLayer_Billing_Item_Software_Component_OperatingSystem_Addon
item.description: SoftLayer_Billing_Item_Software_Component_OperatingSystem_Addon Datatype Description The SoftLayer_Billing_Item_Software_Component_OperatingSystem_Addon data type contains general information relating to a single SoftLayer billing item for operating system add-on software components. Local allowCancellationFlag Flag to check if a billing item can be cancelled. 1 = yes. 0 = no. Type: integer associatedBillingItemId This is sometimes populated for orphan billing items that are not attached to servers. Billing items like secondary portable IP addresses fit into this category.
